result.title: Segment Trees (Practice problems and doubts)
result.content:
Here are the practice problems on Segment Trees-

http://www.spoj.com/problems/GSS1/

http://www.spoj.com/problems/GSS2/

http://www.spoj.com/problems/GSS3/

http://www.spoj.com/problems/GSS4/

https://www.codechef.com/problems/ALGFLXQF/

https://www.codechef.com/problems/BGQRS

https://www.codechef.com/problems/URBANDEV

https://www.codechef.com/problems/ANDMIN

https://www.codechef.com/problems/DIVMAC

http://codeforces.com/contest/703/problem/D

http://codeforces.com/contest/719/problem/E

http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/740/E

http://codeforces.com/contest/707/problem/E

Feel free to post any doubts and suggest more problems in the comments section. Also everyone is welcome to answer any doubts asked here. Taking part in such discussions is quite beneficial for improving skills.

PS : Thanks to nishant_coder for contributing to this post.
